department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Kashmir, Amli-rumel, or square embroidered shawl, worked in darn and stem stitch in a design of cones and floral arabesque in shades of red, blue, green, and yellow on a white ground.  Border of serpentine scrolls and rosettes with outer border of floral panels.  Fringed edges.  A very fine example.  #4 of exhibition.
title: Kashmir, Amli-rumal
